Case Study Details

Context, deliverables, governance framework, and roadmap

Context

Iceland's Ministry of Education sought to deploy AI tools for teachers while maintaining data sovereignty, privacy compliance, and pedagogical quality.

What Shipped

  • • Multi-vendor pilot with Anthropic + Google
  • • Custom training curriculum
  • • Evaluation framework
  • • Vendor governance structure

Governance & Safety

  • • GDPR-compliant data handling
  • • No student data exposure
  • • Ministry oversight committee
  • • Escalation pathways

What's Next

  • • Phase 2: All Icelandic schools
  • • Nordic replication discussions
  • • 40+ country pipeline

Five Models of AI Sovereignty

A codified methodology for evaluating and implementing sovereign AI strategies

1

Full Autonomy

Domestic models & infrastructure

2

Sovereign Infra

Foreign models, domestic compute

3

Governed Partnership

Strong contractual controls

4

Strategic Access

Preferred access, policy controls

5

Open Consumption

Commercial APIs

Why BTR

The Honest Broker for Sovereign AI

In a crowded landscape of AI consultancies and national initiatives, BTR occupies a unique position: independent counsel at the intersection of national interests and the technological frontier.

True Independence

Not beholden to any single vendor. We provide objective sovereignty trade-off analysis without conflicts of interest.

Unparalleled Network

Active relationships with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Cloud, AWS, and NVIDIA. Direct access to frontier AI capabilities.

20+ Year Track Record

Two decades translating emerging technology into policy and organizational change. Crypto, blockchain, cloud, now AI.

Security Experience

Advisory experience with security-sensitive government organizations including U.S. intelligence agencies.

Technical-Policy Bridge

Rare ability to understand both sides: what technology can deliver and what governance requires.

Global Perspective

Experience across 5 continents. Sovereignty means different things in different contexts—we understand that.

"The decisions nations make in 2025-2026 will determine their AI sovereignty for decades. The window for strategic positioning is now."

Leadership

Josh Klein

Founder & Principal Strategist

For two decades, Josh Klein has helped nations and enterprises navigate the most consequential technology transitions of our era. From cryptocurrency and blockchain to cloud computing and now Sovereign AI, he bridges the gap between technical possibility and strategic reality.

His advisory experience with U.S. government organizations including intelligence agencies provides unique insight into security-first AI deployment, while his working relationships with OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Cloud, AWS, and NVIDIA ensure access to cutting-edge capabilities.

Operating from Iceland—a nation recognized for digital innovation, sustainable infrastructure, and strong privacy protections—BTR provides independent counsel at the intersection of national interests and technological frontier.

Technical Cofounder & Sovereign Infrastructure

Serial CTO specializing in large-scale, mission-critical systems at the intersection of AI, identity, and public infrastructure. Currently building Vouch, a sovereign-grade identity platform for governments.

Co-founder of Blue Ridge Labs at Robin Hood, launching FreshEBT, GoodCall, JustFix. Co-creator of NTWRKR multi-agent architecture for government AI deployment.

Dr. Eszter Czibor

Research & Evaluation

Behavioural economist specializing in science, innovation and technology policy. PhD from University of Amsterdam, postdoctoral scholar at University of Chicago.

Currently teaching "AI Economy" at University of Reykjavik. Senior research roles at Nesta's Innovation Growth Lab and StateUp, working with European Commission, UNDP, NASA SBIR.

The Iceland Advantage

Neutral Ground for Sovereign AI

Iceland's unique position—geographically, politically, and technologically—makes it an ideal base for independent Sovereign AI counsel.

Neutral Jurisdiction

Stable democracy with no geopolitical agenda in AI dominance. Trusted by all parties.

Privacy-First Culture

Modern Media Initiative, strong GDPR implementation, history of protecting digital rights.

Sustainable Infrastructure

100% renewable energy, global leader in sustainable data centers. Green AI credentials.

Digital Innovation Leader

One of the world's most digitally advanced societies, pioneered e-government services.

North Atlantic Bridge

Strategic position between North America and Europe for international collaboration.

Nordic/EU Alignment

Strong ties to Nordic AI initiatives and EU AI Act regulatory framework.
